00005 public class ForeignKey implements DatabaseObject, Comparable<ForeignKey> {
00006     private Table primaryKeyTable;
00007     private String primaryKeyColumns;
00008 
00009     private Table foreignKeyTable;
00010     private String foreignKeyColumns;
00011 
00012     private String name;
00013 
00014     private boolean deferrable;
00015     private boolean initiallyDeferred;
00016 
00017     private Integer updateRule;
00018     private Integer deleteRule;

00021     public Table getPrimaryKeyTable() {
00022         return primaryKeyTable;
00023     }

00025     public void setPrimaryKeyTable(Table primaryKeyTable) {
00026         this.primaryKeyTable = primaryKeyTable;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getPrimaryKeyColumns() {
00030         return primaryKeyColumns;
00031     }

00033     public void addPrimaryKeyColumn(String primaryKeyColumn) {
00034         if ((this.primaryKeyColumns == null)
00035                 || (this.primaryKeyColumns.length() == 0)) {
00036             this.primaryKeyColumns = primaryKeyColumn;
00037         } else {
00038             this.primaryKeyColumns = this.primaryKeyColumns + ", "
00039                     + primaryKeyColumn;
00040         }
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setPrimaryKeyColumns(String primaryKeyColumns) {
00044         this.primaryKeyColumns = primaryKeyColumns;
00045     }

00048         return foreignKeyTable;
00049     }

00052         this.foreignKeyTable = foreignKeyTable;
00053     }

00056         return foreignKeyColumns;

00059     public void addForeignKeyColumn(String foreignKeyColumn) {
00060         if ((this.foreignKeyColumns == null)
00061                 || (this.foreignKeyColumns.length() == 0)) {
00062             this.foreignKeyColumns = foreignKeyColumn;
00063         } else {
00064             this.foreignKeyColumns = this.foreignKeyColumns + ", "
00065                     + foreignKeyColumn;
00066         }
00067     }

00082     public String toString() {
00083         return getName() + "(" + getForeignKeyTable() + "." + getForeignKeyColumns() + " ->" + getPrimaryKeyTable() + "." + getPrimaryKeyColumns() + ")";
00084     }

00120     public boolean equals(Object o) {
00121         if (this == o) return true;
00122         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00123 
00124         ForeignKey that = (ForeignKey) o;
00125 
00126         return getForeignKeyColumns().equalsIgnoreCase(that.getForeignKeyColumns())
00127                 && foreignKeyTable.equals(that.foreignKeyTable)
00128                 && getPrimaryKeyColumns().equalsIgnoreCase(that.getPrimaryKeyColumns())
00129                 && primaryKeyTable.equals(that.primaryKeyTable);
00130 
00131     }
00132 
00133     public int hashCode() {
00134         int result = 0;
00135         if (primaryKeyTable != null) {
00136             result = primaryKeyTable.hashCode();
00137         }
00138         if (primaryKeyColumns != null) {
00139             result = 31 * result + primaryKeyColumns.toUpperCase().hashCode();
00140         }
00141 
00142         if (foreignKeyTable != null) {
00143             result = 31 * result + foreignKeyTable.hashCode();
00144         }
00145 
00146         if (foreignKeyColumns != null) {
00147             result = 31 * result + foreignKeyColumns.toUpperCase().hashCode();
00148         }
00149         if (this.updateRule != null)
00150             result = 31 * result + this.updateRule.hashCode();
00151         if (this.deleteRule != null)
00152             result = 31 * result + this.deleteRule.hashCode();
00153 
00154 
00155         return result;
00156     }

00159     public int compareTo(ForeignKey o) {
00160         int returnValue = 0;
00161         if (this.getForeignKeyTable() != null && o.getForeignKeyTable() != null) {
00162             returnValue = this.getForeignKeyTable().compareTo(o.getForeignKeyTable());
00163         }
00164         if (returnValue == 0 && this.getForeignKeyColumns() != null && o.getForeignKeyColumns() != null) {
00165             returnValue = this.getForeignKeyColumns().compareToIgnoreCase(o.getForeignKeyColumns());
00166         }
00167         if (returnValue == 0 && this.getName() != null && o.getName() != null) {
00168             returnValue = this.getName().compareToIgnoreCase(o.getName());
00169         }
00170         if (returnValue == 0 && this.getPrimaryKeyTable() != null && o.getPrimaryKeyTable() != null) {
00171             returnValue = this.getPrimaryKeyTable().compareTo(o.getPrimaryKeyTable());
00172         }
00173 
00174         if (returnValue == 0 && this.getPrimaryKeyColumns() != null && o.getPrimaryKeyColumns() != null) {
00175             returnValue = this.getPrimaryKeyColumns().compareToIgnoreCase(o.getPrimaryKeyColumns());
00176         }
00177         if (returnValue == 0 && this.updateRule != null && o.getUpdateRule() != null)
00178             returnValue = this.updateRule.compareTo(o.getUpdateRule());
00179         if (returnValue == 0 && this.deleteRule != null && o.getDeleteRule() != null)
00180             returnValue = this.deleteRule.compareTo(o.getDeleteRule());
00181         return returnValue;
00182     }

00184     private String toDisplayString(List<String> columnsNames) {
00185         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00186         int i = 0;
00187         for (String columnName : columnsNames) {
00188             i++;
00189             sb.append(columnName);
00190             if (i < columnsNames.size()) {
00191                 sb.append(", ");
00192             }
00193         }
00194         return sb.toString();
00195     }
